attributes.action: Make It Law That All New Drivers Should Take A Motorway Lesson And Test
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am a learner driver and my opinion is that the motorway is a very busy carriageway and can be very dangerous when one driver makes a mistake causing accidents and pile ups.

Drivers who use the motorway for the first time can be nervous with no confidence which can cause them to make a mistake causing a accident.

I would like to see it law that all new drivers should take a lesson and test on the motorway to build up their confidence as this may cause less accidents.
